title: Teriyaki sauce
ingredients: ¼ cup water mixed with 3 teaspoons cornstarch
directions: Combine all ingredients in a small saucepan, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for about 4 minutes.
Remove from heat and let cool.
Store in the fridge for up to a week.
notes: Mirin is a sweet Japanese rice wine, similar to sake but with a lower alcohol content and higher sugar content. If you don’t have mirin, you can use sherry with a pinch of sugar added to it.
